org.drip.analytics.daycount

Class DateAdjustParams

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drip.analytics.daycount.DateAdjustParams

  • public class DateAdjustParams
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains the parameters needed for adjusting dates. It exports the following functionality: - Accessor for holiday calendar and adjustment type - Serialization/De-serialization to and from Byte Arrays
    Author:
    Lakshmi Krishnamurthy
